DOC.brief_summary: VIBER aim assess angiographic outcome drug-eluting balloon angioplasty assist Vascular Imaging Balloon Catheter ( VIBE , Volcano , San Diego , CA ) device , integrate predilation catheter electronic intravascular ultrasound capability .
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year De novo native vessel lesion RVD 2.5 4 mm Limited compliance > 3 month DAPT LMCA
